Shopify 24 Hour Count Down Section

Learn how to create a 24 Hour Count Down section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The 24 Hour Countdown section is a visually engaging timer for your Shopify storefront that highlights limited-time promotions or offers. This section creates a sense of urgency by displaying an hourly countdown that encourages customers to act quickly. Complete with a customizable headline, text, and styling options, this section helps drive conversions by leveraging time-sensitive offers.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "24 Hour Count Down"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  • Flash Sales: Display a countdown during a flash sale event, creating urgency and increasing the likelihood of impulsive purchases.
  • Holiday Promotions: Use the timer for seasonal promotions such as Black Friday, Cyber Monday, or end-of-year clearances to capitalize on limited-time deals.
  • Product Launches: Build excitement and anticipation by counting down to the release of a new product or collection.
  • Special Events: Highlight the countdown to a special event like a giveaway, a webinar, or a timed exclusive meetup, driving customer engagement.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Font Settings:

    • Override theme fonts: Enable custom fonts instead of the default theme fonts.
    • Text Font: Select a custom font for the text.
    • Headline Font: Select a custom font for the headline.

  • Text Settings:

    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text (10px to 50px).
    • Timer Size: Adjust the size of the timer font (10px to 100px).
    • Text Color: Set the color of the text.
    • Headline Size: Adjust the size of the headline (10px to 50px).
    • Headline Color: Set the color of the headline.

  • Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Set the background color for the section.
    • Countdown Background Color: Set the background color for the countdown timer.
    • Timer Color: Set the color for the timer numerals.

  • Alignment Settings:

    • Text Alignment: Choose the alignment for the text (left, center, right).

  • Dimension Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width of the section.
    • Padding: Customize padding for the top, bottom, left, and right sides of the section.
    • Space between Columns: Set the space between the countdown columns.

  • Content Settings:

    • Start Hours Left: Set the initial number of hours to count down from.
    • Headline: Customize the headline text.
    • Content: Add custom text content.
    • Hours Text: Define the label for hours.
    • Minutes Text: Define the label for minutes.
    • Seconds Text: Define the label for seconds.

  • Display Settings:

    • Show Seconds Column: Toggle the visibility of the seconds column.
    • Round Borders on Media: Set the border radius for the countdown items.
    • Subtle Shadow on Media: Enable or disable shadow effect on countdown items.
